condition: Deep Vein Thrombosis Prophylaxis after Abdominal Surgery
review: After being scoped my urologist I was instructed to inject Lovenox twice daily, immediately I had anal or rectal bleed. I was in the hospital three days, I will never take Lovenox again.

condition: Deep Vein Thrombosis Prophylaxis after Abdominal Surgery
review: I took lovenox to prevent blood clots after having an emergency csection with my twin boys. It has been 4 months since I quit taking the shots. I still have pain at the injection sites. Has this happened to anyone else?
